620510a9-4f8c-4e6e-bebc-c38cf986576c.description: This badge earner has successfully completed the Decoded Data Academy: Foundations in Data Analytics, an accelerated one-month course developing foundational skills required for data analysis in Python. They can use Python as a programming language for data analysis in Jupyter and perform basic Exploratory Data Analysis. They have been introduced to the key statistical concepts used in data science and gained experience using Python libraries to visualize data, completing an independent project.
620510a9-4f8c-4e6e-bebc-c38cf986576c.name: Decoded Global Data Academy: Foundations in Data Analytics Certified

badge_template_activities.title: Complete all four weeks of the Decoded Data Academy: Foundations course: Programming in Python, Data Manipulation, Data Concepts and Visualization, and Data Analysis including attendance of all four workshops and completion of all online practice modules.
Passed the final summative assessment with a grade of at least 50% in a restricted online environment through the Decoded Canvas learning platform.

c9a59dd8-8223-441e-930d-b4159a8f7eb7.description: This badge earner has successfully completed the Decoded Data Academy, an accelerated technical development programme in data analytics and data science, using Python. They can use supervised and unsupervised machine learning techniques to access, analyse and visualise data, and build models to make decisions faster. They can work with unique data types to conduct analysis such as time series and text analysis, and they can make informed decisions using big data tools to manage large datasets.
c9a59dd8-8223-441e-930d-b4159a8f7eb7.name: Decoded Data Fellowship Certified

badge_template_activities.title: Complete all modules of the Decoded Data Academy Apprenticeship curriculum and successfully made it to their End-Point Assessment interview as part of the Level 4 Data Analyst Apprenticeship Standard.

695f5d78-01bb-41a5-9fb4-e50bb175299b.description: This badge earner has successfully completed the Decoded Data Academy, an accelerated technical development programme in data analytics and data science, using Python. They can use supervised and unsupervised machine learning techniques to access, analyse and visualise data, and build models to make decisions faster. They can work with unique data types to conduct analysis such as time series and text analysis, and they can make informed decisions using big data tools to manage large datasets.
695f5d78-01bb-41a5-9fb4-e50bb175299b.name: Decoded Data Fellowship Certified

badge_template_activities.title: Complete all modules of the Decoded Data Academy Apprenticeship curriculum and successfully made it to their End-Point Assessment interview as part of the Level 4 Data Analyst Apprenticeship Standard.

762eb217-e5f4-4072-9437-9738f72f1bb8.description: This badge earner has successfully completed the Classification module as part of the Decoded Global Data Academy track, a course which introduces the basics of machine learning. Classification is all about making categorical predictions, and has extremely diverse applications ranging all the way from common spam filters to state-of-the-art AI. Learners will explore a range of classification algorithms and implement classification algorithms in Python using the scikit-learn library.
762eb217-e5f4-4072-9437-9738f72f1bb8.name: Classification

badge_template_activities.title: Achieve at least 100 points in the Decoded Classification module. Points can be gained through attendance of a hands-on workshop, completion of online learning content and passing a final summative assessment with a grade of at least 50%.

e77e2f1d-267d-4a22-b39a-d0ec82a7cfce.description: This badge earner has successfully completed the Web Scraping & APIs module as part of the Decoded Global Data Academy track. They have been developing skills required to work with remote data sources and common data formats. Learners are introduced to the concepts underlying communication over the web, and interact with live datasets. Learners manipulate JSON and XML, and query APIs using Python libraries. They’ll explore ethical issues, extract data from web pages and query bs4 objects.
e77e2f1d-267d-4a22-b39a-d0ec82a7cfce.name: Web Scraping & APIs

badge_template_activities.title: Achieve at least 100 points in the Decoded Web Scraping & APIs module. Points can be gained through attendance of a hands-on workshop, completion of online learning content and passing a final summative assessment with a grade of at least 50%.

803427e4-cb7e-4847-a803-82e67b638720.description: This badge earner has successfully completed the Regression module as part of the Decoded Global Data Academy track, a course which introduces linear regression in Python. By the end of the module they can implement an end-to-end linear regression analysis using scikit-learn, including checking the assumptions, choosing and applying the appropriate evaluation metrics as well as analysing and interpreting the regression coefficients and their statistical significance.
803427e4-cb7e-4847-a803-82e67b638720.name: Regression

badge_template_activities.title: Achieve at least 100 points in the Decoded Regression module. Points can be gained through attendance of a hands-on workshop, completion of online learning content and passing a final summative assessment with a grade of at least 50%.

15304b1d-30ba-4ce6-9347-537765387f27.description: This badge earner has successfully completed the Time Series module as part of the Decoded Global Data Academy track, a course which covers the key components of time series such as trend over time, seasonality effects and stationarity. This badge earner has practice applying various time series analysis techniques in Python e.g. decomposition, autocorrelation analysis and differencing. Time Series forecasting methods are introduced covering the limitations as well as evaluation methods.
15304b1d-30ba-4ce6-9347-537765387f27.name: Time Series Analysis

badge_template_activities.title: Achieve at least 100 points in the Decoded Time Series module. Points can be gained through attendance of a hands-on workshop, completion of online learning content and passing a final summative assessment with a grade of at least 50%.

f336f058-bc81-4b95-84b1-b40059b3e3b4.description: This badge earner has successfully completed the Decoded Data Academy: Foundations in Data Analytics, a course focused on developing foundational skills required for data analysis in Python. They can use Python as a programming language for data analysis in Jupyter and perform basic Exploratory Data Analysis. They have been introduced to the key statistical concepts used in data science and gained experience using Python libraries to visualize data.
f336f058-bc81-4b95-84b1-b40059b3e3b4.name: Foundations

badge_template_activities.title: Achieve at least 100 points in the Decoded Foundations course: Programming in Python, Data Manipulation, Data Concepts and Visualization, and Data Analysis. Points can be gained through attendance of four hands-on workshops, completion of four pieces of online learning content and four quizzes, passing a final summative assessment with a grade of at least 50% and passing a final project with a grade of at least 50%.
Achieve at least 50% in the final project and/or passing a final summative assessment with a grade of at least 50% .

18ed5350-ad01-477e-bd43-83af5a7f8640.description: This badge earner has completed the Decoded Data Academy in Python, an 18-month programme in data science. They can apply supervised and unsupervised machine learning techniques to access, analyse and visualise data, and build models to solve core business challenges. They can use internal and open-source data to bring realised impact to their organisation through a portfolio of industry and role-relevant data projects, following the Institute for Apprenticeships’ Level 4 Data Analyst Standard.
18ed5350-ad01-477e-bd43-83af5a7f8640.name: Decoded Data Academy Certified

badge_template_activities.title: Complete all modules of the Decoded Data Academy Apprenticeship curriculum and successfully made it to their End-Point Assessment interview as part of the Level 4 Data Analyst Apprenticeship Standard.

f9894d47-548b-4a3f-bc60-b9daa78ab148.description: This badge earner has successfully completed the Capstone project as part of the Decoded Global Data Academy track. The earner has completed an end-to-end data science project for a specific business challenge within their own organisation, including: sourcing their data, conducting analysis using one or more techniques covered through the Decoded Global Data Academy, and completing a written report. This has been marked and reviewed by a Decoded Data Tutor.
f9894d47-548b-4a3f-bc60-b9daa78ab148.name: Capstone Project

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a data science project using organisational data to address a business problem and using at least one or more analysis techniques from the Decoded Global Data Academy such as classification, regression or time series analysis. Achieve at least 50% to pass the Capstone project.

Identifies an appropriate data question and states testable hypotheses and initial expectations. Sources relevant data and explains its application to the organisation. Fully considers data sharing issues and guidelines.
Examines and discusses core features of the data. Uses a range of visualization methods and interprets the results. Uses a range of statistical methods to analyse data.

Uses a range of appropriate data cleaning and preparation methods. Explains the preparation process and justifies decisions based on specific context. Shows an understanding of the implications variable transformations have on the data and the analysis.
Use a range of analytical techniques to model and understand the data.
Draws clear conclusions and insights from data. Explores the limitations of the model and its applicability beyond the data. Considers the data question and the hypotheses.

The project is well-structured and has a clear narrative from beginning to end. It is comprehensible for an audience without specialist knowledge. The text is well-articulated and engaging. Visualisations are clearly labelled, adding value to the overall analysis and supporting the narrative.

63e2649e-5b0e-4660-9001-047317a288cf.description: This badge earner has successfully completed the Data Storytelling module, a course which builds the foundations of effective data storytelling as part of the Decoded Global Data Academy. Learners practice effective data visualisation and communication techniques, ethical frameworks, storytelling techniques, as well as presentation tools and resources including open-source dashboarding and visualisation tools. They can plan and develop a data story using their own data analysis.
63e2649e-5b0e-4660-9001-047317a288cf.name: Data Storytelling

badge_template_activities.title: Achieve at least 100 points in the Decoded Data Storytelling module. Points can be gained through attendance of a hands-on workshop, completion of online learning content and passing a final summative assessment with a grade of at least 50%.

9466ba06-a6e5-4308-acba-01f7243f6e4b.description: This badge earner has successfully worked through a variety of data focused modules as part of the Decoded Data Academy track with Distinction. The earner has developed the foundational skills to enable them to carry out end-to-end data analytics and data science projects in Python, from cleaning and manipulating data to training and evaluating machine learning models. The earner has successfully completed an individual capstone project.
9466ba06-a6e5-4308-acba-01f7243f6e4b.name: Decoded Data Academy Certified with Distinction

badge_template_activities.title: Work through 6 data modules in the Decoded programme and achieve at least 600 points (>70%) overall. Points can be gained through attendance of hands-on workshops, completion of online learning content, completion of the Foundations final project with a grade of at least 50% and passing final summative assessments with grades of at least 50%.
Achieve at least 50% in the Capstone project.

e905a398-e90a-4906-84c6-7ffdd9d5c375.description: This badge earner has completed the Decoded Data Academy in Python, an 18-month programme in data science. They can apply supervised and unsupervised machine learning techniques to access, analyse and visualise data, and build models to solve core business challenges. They can use internal and open-source data to bring realised impact to their organisation through a portfolio of industry and role-relevant data projects, following the Institute for Apprenticeships’ Level 4 Data Analyst Standard.
e905a398-e90a-4906-84c6-7ffdd9d5c375.name: Decoded Data Academy Certified

badge_template_activities.title: Complete all modules of the Decoded Data Academy Apprenticeship curriculum and successfully made it to their End-Point Assessment interview as part of the Level 4 Data Analyst Apprenticeship Standard.

badge_template_activities.title: Complete all modules of the Decoded Data Academy Apprenticeship curriculum and successfully made it to their End-Point Assessment interview as part of the Level 4 Data Analyst Apprenticeship Standard.

8d085600-954f-40c0-973d-37aef8203116.description: This badge earner has successfully completed the Decoded Data Academy in Python, an accelerated technical program in data analytics, using internal & open-source data to bring realised impact to their organisation through a portfolio of data projects. They can use supervised and unsupervised machine learning techniques to access, analyse and visualise data, build models to make informed decisions, work with unique data types such as time series and use big data to manage large datasets.
8d085600-954f-40c0-973d-37aef8203116.name: Decoded Data Academy Certified

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a portfolio of data science projects using organisational data demonstrating the following machine learning and data analysis techniques: cluster analysis, association rules, regression, classification, time series analysis, text analysis, SQL and big data.
Complete all 15 modules of the 15-month Decoded Data Academy with verified and graded submissions of projects and end of module assessments through Decoded's online learning platform, Canvas.

e9425544-f186-4b07-bfcb-1663f8682566.description: Earners have learned how to evaluate and prioritise investment in data technologies in different parts of their organisation. Earners will be familiar with issues such as selection bias and confirmation bias and will have an awareness of how to manage the risk of introducing bias and prejudice when overseeing the building of new models. Earners have learned to craft actionable descriptive and predictive questions and are able to articulate opportunities for experimentation in the business.
e9425544-f186-4b07-bfcb-1663f8682566.name: Data-Driven Mindset

badge_template_activities.title: Attended four 3.5 hour workshops and participated in online interactive activities

ea77cdc3-3611-43cc-982f-e46111387d2a.description: This badge earner has successfully worked through a variety of data focused modules as part of the Decoded Data Academy track with Merit. The earner has developed the foundational skills to enable them to carry out end-to-end data analytics and data science projects in Python, from cleaning and manipulating data to training and evaluating machine learning models.
ea77cdc3-3611-43cc-982f-e46111387d2a.name: Decoded Data Academy Certified with Merit

Points can be gained through attendance of hands-on workshops, completion of online learning content, completion of the Foundations final project with a grade of at least 50% and passing final summative assessments with grades of at least 50%.
